text: ‘‘Ivvulakattil nam valum valkkaiyait tavira veroru valkkai illai'' enrum, ‘‘(itiltan) nam valntu kontirukkirom; pinnar irantu vitukirom. Kalattait tavira (veru etuvum) nam'mai alippatillai'' enrum avarkal kurukinranar. Itaipparri ivarkalukku oru nanamum illai. Ivarkal vin cantekattil alntirupporait tavira verillai
